Enums/RecognitionReliability.html#/s:18S.name: verifiable
Enums/RecognitionReliability.html#/s:18S.abstract: Requires the last three frames return the same results

Enums/RecognitionReliability.html#/s:18S.name: stable
Enums/RecognitionReliability.html#/s:18S.abstract: Requires the last four frames return the same results

Enums/RecognitionReliability.html#/s:18S.name: solid
Enums/RecognitionReliability.html#/s:18S.abstract: Requires the last five frames return the same results

Enums/RecognitionReliability.html.name: RecognitionReliability
Enums/RecognitionReliability.html.abstract: The level of reliability required to assure OCR accuracy. The higher the reliability, the longer it will take to return results
